name: !commands
description: Displays a link to the command list

name: !discord
description: Displays a link to my Discord server

name: !love
description: Show the target viewer some love!

name: !hug
description: Give the target viewer a hug!

name: !quote
description: Display a random quote || display a quote by its number

name: !heist
description: Start/join a heist to get points!

name: !points
description: Display how many points you have

name: !top
description: Display the top viewers based on points

name: !tophours
description: Display the top viewers based on hours watched

name: !death
description: Display current number of deaths on the death counter
